headline: Intuit Inc. (INTU): Among the Best Stocks to Buy According to Lone Pine Capital
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Top 10 Stocks to Buy According to Lone Pine Capital. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Intuit Inc.
